com.artemis.injection

Class CachedField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.injection.CachedField

  • public class CachedField
extends Object
    Provides cached information about a class-field, limiting the need for reflection on repeated access. This class only caches the state related to the Wire annotation of the field.

    CachedField is typically managed by InjectionCache, and can be retrieved with InjectionCache.getCachedField(Field).

    Author:
    Snorre E. Brekke

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean failOnNull 
      Field field
      The field this class represents.
      String name
      If the field is annotated with Wire, this will contain the cached value of Wire.name().
      WireType wireType
      WireType.WIRE if the field is annotated with Wire, WireType.SKIPWIRE if the field is annotated with com.artemis.annotations.SkipWire), {@link WireType#IGNORED} otherwise.
